channel.title: Tutorial on Julia Furst Morgado
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on Julia Furst Morgado

item.title: How to Contribute to CNCF Glossary Localization - No Code!
item.description: Introduction The Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) Glossary is a valuable resource that helps clarify the terminology and jargon used in the world of cloud-native computing.

item.title: Build a Website with HUGO on AWS Amplify
item.description: Learn how to build a static site with Hugo and deploy it on AWS Amplify. This is a detailed tutorial to help you start from scratch!

item.title: Automatically Embed Latest Youtube Videos on your Website with JavaScript (step by step)
item.description: In this tutorial, you’ll learn how to make an HTTP request to Youtube with the JavaScript fetch() method to dynamically embed new video on your website as you publish it on youtube.

item.title: The difference between encodeURI() and encodeURIComponent()
item.description: What is a URI and how is it different from a URL?

item.title: How To Remove The HTML Extension From a URL on Netlify
item.description: Recently, I was asked how to get rid of the HTML prefix from a URL on a website hosted on Netlify.

item.title: Connecting MongoDB to your app using Node.js
item.description: MongoDB is an open source NoSQL database management program. NoSQL databases are quite useful for working with large sets of distributed data.

item.title: Filter out the geese (Codewars — 8kyu)
item.description: Here’s a link to the Codewars Kata: codewars.com/kata/57ee4a67108d3fd9eb0000e7/.. The goal of this exercise is to get back an array without some specific elements in it (elements that are specified in the geese array).

item.title: 6 Ways to Make Sure You’re Using the Right Array Method
item.description: Understanding arrays is an important part of coding with JavaScript but array methods are what make JavaScript arrays so powerful.
